product_name: Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and "all leather" don't often go together, but the women's Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots are lean, nimble and tough for comfort on your hiking adventures. All-leather uppers feature rubber toe caps for protection from stones and roots along the trail. GORE-TEX(R) lining provides dependable waterproofing and breathable comfort to keep feet dry. EVA midsoles cushion your steps; webbing laces are reinforced with metal to make them extra strong. Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots for women have a webbing loop at the heel so you can carry them or clip them onto your pack for stream crossings (clip not included). Vibram(R) Neo Day Hiker soles provide moderate lug depth for great traction without a lot of extra weight. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and "all leather" don't often go together, but the women's Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots are lean, nimble and tough for comfort on your hiking adventures.
